vernac_cmds: Definition contractive {A} `{ageable A} (f: pred A -> pred A) : Prop := forall P Q, |> (P <=> Q) |-- f P <=> f Q.
Definition nonexpansive {A} `{ageable A} (f: pred A -> pred A) : Prop := forall P Q, (P <=> Q) |-- f P <=> f Q.
Definition HOcontractive {A} `{ageable A} (X: Type) (f: (X -> pred A) -> (X -> pred A)) : Prop := forall P Q, (ALL x:X, |> (P x <=> Q x)) |-- (ALL x:X, f P x <=> f Q x).
Definition HOnonexpansive {A} `{ageable A} (X: Type) (f: (X -> pred A) -> (X -> pred A)) : Prop := forall P Q, (ALL x:X, P x <=> Q x) |-- (ALL x:X, f P x <=> f Q x).
Parameter HORec : forall {A} `{ageable A} X (f: (X -> pred A) -> (X -> pred A)), X -> pred A.
Axiom HORec_fold_unfold : forall {A} `{ageable A} X f (H:HOcontractive (X:=X) f), HORec f = f (HORec f).
Parameter Rec : forall {A} `{ageable A} (f: pred A -> pred A), pred A.
Axiom Rec_fold_unfold : forall {A} `{ageable A} f (H:contractive f), Rec f = f (Rec f).
Variable f: (X-> pred A) -> (X -> pred A).
Fixpoint HORec' (n:nat) : X -> pred A := match n with | S n' => f (HORec' n') | O => f (fun _ => FF) end.
Lemma HORec'_unage: forall j n x a, (n >= level a) -> (HORec' n x a <-> HORec' (j+n) x a).
assert (j + n >= level a) by omega.
clear H; rename H0 into H.
assert ((ALL x : X , (HORec' i x <=> HORec' (S i) x)) (level a)).
remember (level a) as n; clear Heqn.
revert n H; induction i; intros.
rewrite laterR_nat in H; elimtype False; omega.
Definition HORec {A} `{ag: ageable A} {X: Type} (f: (X-> pred A) -> (X -> pred A)) (x: X) : pred A := mkPred (fun a : A => app_pred (@HORec' A ag X f (level a) x) a).
Lemma HORec_fold_unfold {A} `{ageable A} : forall X f (H:HOcontractive (X:=X) f), HORec f = f (HORec f).
cut (forall a, HORec f x a <-> f (HORec f) x a).
remember (level a0) as n; clear a0 Heqn.
destruct (@Hcont (HORec' f n) (HORec f) (level a)) with x a; [ | omega | ].
apply (@HORec'_unage _ _ X f Hcont (n - level x') (level x') b x' (le_refl _)).
replace (n - level x' + level x') with n by omega.
apply (@HORec'_unage _ _ X f Hcont (n - level a') (level a') b a' (le_refl _)) in H0.
replace (n - level a' + level a') with n in H0 by omega.
apply (@HORec'_unage _ _ X f Hcont (level a - level x') (level x') x x' (le_refl _)).
replace (level a - level x' + level x') with (level a) by (apply necR_level in H3; omega).
destruct (@Hcont (fun _ => FF) (HORec f) (level a)) with x a; try omega.
repeat (hnf; intros); split; hnf; simpl; intros.
inv H2; [ | unfold age in H3; congruence].
Lemma cont_HOcont : @HOcontractive A ag unit (fun x _ => f (x tt)).
Definition Rec {A} `{ageable A} f : pred A := HORec (fun x _ => f (x tt)) tt.
Lemma Rec_fold_unfold : forall {A} `{ageable A} f (H:contractive f), Rec f = f (Rec f).

command: assert (j + n >= level a) by omega.
clear H; rename H0 into H.
assert ((ALL x : X , (HORec' i x <=> HORec' (S i) x)) (level a)).
remember (level a) as n; clear Heqn.
revert n H; induction i; intros.
rewrite laterR_nat in H; elimtype False; omega.
cut (forall a, HORec f x a <-> f (HORec f) x a).
remember (level a0) as n; clear a0 Heqn.
destruct (@Hcont (HORec' f n) (HORec f) (level a)) with x a; [ | omega | ].
apply (@HORec'_unage _ _ X f Hcont (n - level x') (level x') b x' (le_refl _)).
replace (n - level x' + level x') with n by omega.
apply (@HORec'_unage _ _ X f Hcont (n - level a') (level a') b a' (le_refl _)) in H0.
replace (n - level a' + level a') with n in H0 by omega.
apply (@HORec'_unage _ _ X f Hcont (level a - level x') (level x') x x' (le_refl _)).
replace (level a - level x' + level x') with (level a) by (apply necR_level in H3; omega).
destruct (@Hcont (fun _ => FF) (HORec f) (level a)) with x a; try omega.
repeat (hnf; intros); split; hnf; simpl; intros.
inv H2; [ | unfold age in H3; congruence].
